text: aur un logon ke lie jo yahoodee hue hamane naakhoonavaala jaanavar haraam kiya aur gaay aur bakaree mein se in donon kee charabiyaan unake lie haraam kar dee theen, sivaay us (charbee) ke jo un donon kee peethon ya aankhon se lagee huee ya haddee se milee huee ho. yah baat dhyaan mein rakho. hamane unhen unakee sarakashee ka badala diya tha aur nishchay hee ham sachche hai
